title: ExtensionLoader attempts to load classes that shouldn't be required
body:
### Describe the bug

After a production build, unused classes, like those from `testcontainers`, must still be present in certain cases otherwise the app crashes on startup. 

See https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-vault/issues/12#issuecomment-991277372. For a good description of the issue.

### Expected behavior

Classes unused in production, like anything only used for DevServices, shouldn't be required.

### Actual behavior

Any type referenced in the signature of any method of a build class will always be required.

### How to Reproduce?

See https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-vault/issues/12 for instructions to reproduce using the Vault extension.


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_
